Wennovation Hub bụ onye na-eme ngwa ngwa na Naịjirịa, nwere ọfịs na Abuja, Kaduna, Lagos na Ibadan. Dị ka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ mbụ na Naịjirịa, ebe e guzobere ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, afọ 2010 ma meghee ọnụ ụzọ ya n'oge na Febụwarị, na afọ 2011, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge ọ na-enwe ọtụtụ mmalite mmeri gụnyere Hutbay, OTGPlaya, Fuelmetrics na Nerve Mobile dị ka ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-aga nke ọma
Ọ na-elekwasị anya na ngalaba mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya gụnyere agụmakwụkwọ, ọrụ ugbo, nlekọta ahụike na akụrụngwa ma mesie ike mkpa ọ dị ịmepụta ọrụ na mmemme ya

A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe a na-akpọ ugbu a usoro okike nke ndagwurugwu Yabacon, Wennovation ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ejigide ihe nlereanya nke ebe ọhụrụ ọmụmụ na mpụga mpaghara Yabacon, kama ịgbasa usoro okike na ókèala ya
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ na Ikeja dị nso n'obodo kọmputa, na Abuja na mpaghara azụmahịa Jabi na Ibadan na UI-Poly axis na mpaghara Mokola.
E guzobere Wennovation Hub na mbụ dị ka onye na-akwado Africa Leadership Forum na LoftyInc Allied Partners
N'afọ 2014, a tụgharịrị ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke onwe ya, Wennovation Hub Gte Ltd

N'afọ 2015, Wennovation Hub ghọrọ otu n'ime Hubs mbụ meghere ọnụ ụzọ ya na Ibadan, ọzọ na mmekorita ya na Africa Leadership Forum. Wennovation Hub na-eji ọtụtụ ụdị eme ihe na usoro ya dị iche iche gụnyere ụdị Kick Accelerator na ụdị Village Capital.

Wennovation Hub na-agba ọtụtụ asọmpi atụmatụ azụmahịa, hackathons ma na-akwado mmalite na itinye ego kpọmkwem. Tech Point ghọtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ngwa ngwa 5 na Naịjirịa, mmalite nwere ike iburu nnukwu echiche ha na afọ 2015. E nyere Wennovation Hub na afọ 2015 Ashoka: Innovators for the Public Global Changemakers Award site na Ashoka Foundation.
Ndị guzobere Wennovation Hub bụ Wole Odetayo, Michael Oluwagbemi, Idris Bello na Dami Agboola.
